name: io.github.imran-siddique/agentos
description: Build and manage policy-compliant AI agents with safety enforcement and compliance checking

environmentVariables.description: Policy enforcement mode: strict (block all violations) or permissive (warn only)
environmentVariables.name: AGENTOS_POLICY_MODE

environmentVariables.description: Log level: debug, info, warn, or error
environmentVariables.name: AGENTOS_LOG_LEVEL
